import React from 'react' import style from './css/playerInfo.module.css' import GetStatsButton from './GetStatsButton' const PlayerInfo = ({ first, last, position, heightF, heightI, weight, team, playerId, getStats, setb}) => { return (

'19 - '20 season averages

{first} {last}

Position: {position} | Height: {heightF}"{heightI} | Weight: {weight}lbs | Team: {team}

) } export default PlayerInfo
